mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS CNT , T.* FROM ( SELECT (SELECT PROD_NAME FROM PROD WHERE BOARD.PROD_ID = PROD.PROD_ID) AS PROD_NAME , (SELECT MEM_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE BOARD.MEM_ID = MEMBER.MEM_ID) AS MEM_NAME , BD_TITLE , BD_RATING , BD_DATE , MEM_ID , BD_KIND_ID , PROD_ID , BD_ID FROM BOARD ORDER BY BD_DATE DESC )T
